title: AMD's Ryzen 7 9850X3D tipped for modest price hike â€” early listings point to $500 list for refreshed Zen 5 CPU
summary: A new tip suggests the pricing of AMD's Ryzen 7 9850X3D will be close to the 9800X3D. Listings show a $511.4 ask for the new chip, but no official MSRP is mentioned. Running a few calculations gives us a value of around $499 as the supposed list price.
